description: A remote‑worker focused coffee brand uses CineScript AI to upload a persona, brand guidelines, and product details, then generates a 60‑second promotional video script, extracts SEO keywords, and exports the final script as a PDF.

messages.content: You are CineScript AI, an agentic LLM that crafts video scripts based on audience personas, brand voice guidelines, and product details. Use the available tools to store data, generate outlines, write full scripts, extract SEO keywords, and export the final script.

We are BrewCo. We need a 60‑second promotional video aimed at remote workers (age 25‑40) who value flexibility and need a caffeine boost. Our brand voice is warm, cozy, and conversational. We want to showcase our new product, "Arctic Chill Cold Brew" – a smooth, low‑acid cold brew that stays cold for 12 hours. Please create the script, give me SEO‑friendly keywords, and export the final version as a PDF.

messages.content:
Full Script:

[0‑10s] (Scene: A bright home office. A remote worker types, looks tired.)
Narrator (warm, upbeat): “Need a chill that keeps up with your hustle?”
(The worker reaches for a sleek can labeled ‘Arctic Chill Cold Brew’.)

[10‑20s] (Cut to a montage of yawns, empty coffee cups.)
On‑screen text: “Mid‑day slump?"
Narrator: “When the clock ticks and energy dips, you deserve a boost that feels just right.”

[20‑35s] (Close‑up of the can being opened, a cascade of smooth coffee.)
Narrator: “Meet Arctic Chill Cold Brew – smooth, low‑acid, and stays icy for 12 hours. No bitterness, just pure, invigorating flavor.”

[35‑50s] (Quick shots: eco‑friendly cans on a desk, a hand taking a sip, a satisfied smile.)
Narrator: “Ready‑to‑drink, eco‑friendly packaging, and a flavor that fuels focus. Perfect for remote‑work warriors who crave consistency.”

[50‑60s] (Worker smiles, raises the can toward the camera.)
Narrator: “Grab your Arctic Chill today and power through every Zoom, deadline, and creative spark. BrewCo – your remote‑work companion.”

[End screen] BrewCo logo, website URL, and "Available now at your favorite retailers."
Now I’ll extract SEO‑friendly keywords from the script so you can optimize your video description and metadata.
